peril.io

Class TextFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.io.TextFileWriter

  • public class TextFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the behaviour of writing text to a file.
    Since:
    2018-02-06
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean append
      Holds whether this TextFileWriter will append to the target file or not.
      private java.lang.String path
      Holds the path to the file to be written in.
      private java.io.PrintWriter printer
      The PrintWriter that prints lines to the file.
      private java.io.FileWriter writer
      The FileWriter that opens the file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextFileWriter(java.lang.String path, boolean append)
      Constructs a new TextFileWriter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void open()
      Opens the TextFileWriter allowing the target filr to be written into using writeLine(String).
      void save()
      Saves the lines added to the target file.
      void writeLine(java.lang.String line)
      Writes a line to the file.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens the TextFileWriter allowing the target filr to be written into using writeLine(String).

      • writeLine

        public void writeLine(java.lang.String line)
        Writes a line to the file. To change the file and add the specified lines use save()
        Parameters:
        line - line to write to the file.

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves the lines added to the target file.
